job.title: Software Engineer
job.description:
Leveraging financial information is what Puzzle is all about. We are an ambitious startup, well funded by a top tier VC with an experienced team who have built multiple successful companies and raised over $500M.
We are solving a true pain point that every company has and keeps having as they grow.
We are on a mission to hire the very best and are committed to creating a culture where everyone is respected and has access to equal opportunity. We know that new ideas can come from anywhere in the organization, and the next big idea could be yours!
What Are We Doing?
Starting a company has become easier, but growing a company is more complicated than ever. We are building a real-time, smarter financial infrastructure to put trustworthy data into the hands of decision-makers.
We are currently remote, but will have a hub in San Francisco. But you can work from anywhere.
Job Description
As part of Puzzle you will help design and build our financial data system.
We will be ingesting large amounts of data from disparate sources, transforming them, organizing them, and correlating them -- delivering the core platform for the rest of our products.
We expect the data to be large, dirty, and difficult to wrangle.
We want to be as real time as possible, event driven, and decoupled. Redundant, resistant and secure. And accuracy is key.
This is your opportunity to be an early engineer at a well funded startup that has a successful founder and a drive to change how company's leverage their financials. We are remote first, so anywhere in North America works for us.
What You’ll Do
Scale out our core ingestion platform
Create unique functionality for correlation of data
Design interfaces and apis to our data
Extend and architect our event pipeline for speed and scale
Extend our core reporting platform
Work on designing endpoints for our product
Handle an ever growing stream of data
Anything else that comes along...
What You Need To Succeed
BS/MS in Computer Science, a related field, or equivalent work experience
4+ years as a professional software engineer
Experience developing large-scale, data intensive applications, ideally using technologies like Node, Python, PubSub, Kafka, Kinesis, ElasticSearch
Experience maintaining highly available, fault-tolerant, and distributed services, including familiarity with technologies, microservices, managed services, GCP, Docker
Experience with the design of and integration with APIs and web services such as REST APIs and GraphQL
Experience with agile software development methodologies
Experience with financial systems is a big plus
Experience with security is a big plus
Desired Skills
Practical experience in developing applications using microservices, container technologies, container management systems such as Docker, Kubernetes etc
Strong experience with Databases design (SQL, NoSQL) and analytics
Prior working experience in utility computing and/or cloud computing domain highly desired
Experience building and deploying applications and services into cloud environments (GCP highly desired)
Puzzle is an equal opportunity and affirmative action employer. We welcome and encourage diversity in the workplace regardless of gender, race or color, ethnicity or national origin, age, disability, religion, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, veteran status, or any other characteristics protected by law.
